protocol.name: P-GSE25889-2
protocol.text: 16 day old seedlings were transfer to plate contained 40% PEG solution for 6hr

protocol.name: P-GSE25889-3
protocol.text: Arabidopsis seedlings on Murashige and Skoog (MS) medium agar plates were routinely grown under continuous white  light (~75 μmol m-2 s -1) at 23±1℃.

protocol.name: P-GSE25889-4
protocol.text: Trizol extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE25889-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 6 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE25889-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip Arabidopsis Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the AffymetrixFluidics Station 450.

protocol.name: P-GSE25889-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using GeneChip Scanner 3000

protocol.name: P-GSE25889-8
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. The trimmed mean target intensity of each array was arbitrarily set to 100.
